content:
Hello everyone!

I have been working with IoT for some time, but in the world of Machine Tools. So I am very familiar with industry standards like MTConnect.

I accepted the challenge of moving to health care, which is completely new to me. Could someone please point the best way to start with health care connectivity standards?

I want to follow the right path from the beginning.

Thank you very much in advance!

HL7 provides training on the standards such as HL7v2, CDA and FHIR. IT's a good step to go with training. FHIR is the latest and greatest (and available at fhir.hl7.org if you like a self driven learning)
